short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension checks photo quality in Athena records, advising if a photo needs retaking or if none is found.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photo Quality Checker for Athena Records

Ensure your Athena records always feature high-quality patient photos with the Photo Quality Checker extension! This handy tool scans the photos in your Athena records, providing instant feedback on whether the photos meet quality standards or if they need retaking. Additionally, it alerts you if no photo is found in a record, helping you maintain complete and accurate documentation.
Key Features:
Automated Photo Quality Analysis: Instantly evaluates the quality of photos in your Athena records.
Retake Suggestions: Advises when a photo does not meet quality standards, ensuring all photos are clear and useful.
Missing Photo Alerts: Notifies you if a record lacks a photo, so you can take immediate action.
User-Friendly Interface: Easy to use with intuitive prompts and clear instructions.
Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with your existing Athena records system, enhancing your workflow without any hassle.
